com.cube.storm

Class ContentSettings.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cube.storm.ContentSettings.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    ContentSettings

    public static class ContentSettings.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    The builder class for ContentSettings. Use this to create a new ContentSettings instance with the customised properties specific for your project. Call build() to build the settings object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ContentSettings.Builder(Context context)
      Default constructor

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ContentSettings build()
      Builds the final settings object and sets its instance.
      ContentSettings.Builder defaultResolver(com.cube.storm.util.lib.resolver.Resolver defaultResolver)
      Sets the default resolver for the bundled content
      ContentSettings.Builder setPreferredCachePath(java.lang.String path)
      Set the path to use as the cache dir instead of external cache of the device
      ContentSettings.Builder setUseExternalCache(boolean useExternal)
      If not using external cache, set this to false and set the path to use on the file system

    • Method Detail

      • setUseExternalCache

        public ContentSettings.Builder setUseExternalCache(boolean useExternal)
        If not using external cache, set this to false and set the path to use on the file system
        Parameters:
        useExternal - false if using different cache location

      • setPreferredCachePath

        public ContentSettings.Builder setPreferredCachePath(java.lang.String path)
        Set the path to use as the cache dir instead of external cache of the device

      • defaultResolver

        public ContentSettings.Builder defaultResolver(com.cube.storm.util.lib.resolver.Resolver defaultResolver)
        Sets the default resolver for the bundled content
        Parameters:
        defaultResolver - The new default resolver
        Returns:
        The ContentSettings.Builder instance for chaining

      • build

        public ContentSettings build()
        Builds the final settings object and sets its instance. Use ContentSettings.getInstance() to retrieve the settings instance.
        Returns:
        The newly set ContentSettings instance
